senses.sense_definition: A person whose job is to catch and remove rats.

examples.text: The city council decided to hire a professional <w>ratcatcher</w> to solve the infestation problem.
In the story, the <w>ratcatcher</w> used a magical pipe to lead the animals away from the town.

senses.sense_definition: An insulting term used to describe a person considered low, contemptible, or treacherous.

examples.text: He shouted at his rival, calling him a vile <w>ratcatcher</w> during their heated argument.
The character in the play mocks his enemy by addressing him as a <w>ratcatcher</w>.
